  3. NetEase offers a seven-minute gameplay trailer of Ananta from Tokyo Game Show  Massively Overpowered
  4. That Anime Game That Looks Like Every Other Game Apparently Has 800 People Working On It  OpenCritic
  5. 'Anime GTA' game Ananta also lifts from Spider-Man to be the uber-open-world RPG  Polygon

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection Vol. 2 Is Still Coming, But What's In It? - GameSpot
item.description:
1. Metal Gear Solid Master Collection Vol. 2 Is Still Coming, But What's In It?  GameSpot
  2. Metal Gear Solid Master Collection Vol 2 is still ‘moving forward properly’, Konami says  Video Games Chronicle
  3. Konami Polls Fans To Get Their Thoughts on Which Metal Gear Game It Should Remake Next  IGN
  4. Metal Gear Solid Developers Discuss Master Collection Volume 2, Future Remakes, and Ongoing Updates  Twisted Voxel
  5. Konami finally gives an update on Metal Gear Solid Master Collection Vol. 2, assuring that development is moving forward, and I hope that means Metal Gear Solid 4's escape from PS3 is close at hand  GamesRadar+
